channel.title: Sprite client
channel.description: when i try load the auto downloading cache on a sprite client it downloads and then it wont load it comes up with: [code]java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method8(client.java:4760) at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:146) at Applet_Sub1.destroy(Applet_Sub1.java:198) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code] and then it wont load the cache does anyone know how to fix?

item.title: Sprite client
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

Did you change the destination of the cache folder?

Read full topic

item.title: Sprite client

item.description:
@danward wrote:

when i try load the auto downloading cache on a sprite client it downloads and then it wont load it comes up with:

java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method8(client.java:4760) at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:146) at Applet_Sub1.destroy(Applet_Sub1.java:198) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
and then it wont load the cache does anyone know how to fix?
